From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM  
To: 
Cc: 
, "Mark S. Cohen" 
Subject: Re: URGENT re: Ghislaine Maxwell 
Date: Fri, 15 Jan 2021 19:07:01 +0000 
Christian 
I 
missed your email yesterday. 
Enjoy the weekend. 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
New York, NY 10011 
Main: 
Cell: 
Fax:

delete this message. Thank you. 
On 
Jan 15, 2021, at 1:30 PM, 
Good afternoon Bobbi: 
> wrote: 
As I previously noted, the legal department is not involved in the 
processing of legal or regular mail. Additionally, there are BOP 
policies and procedures that must be complied with when processing 
mail. 
Have a good weekend. 
Best, 
EFTA00030880

BOBBI C STERNHEIM 1/15/2021 1:27 PM >» 
I am on the VTC with Ms. Maxwell. 
She has not received the time-sensitive legal mail referenced in my 
earlier email. 
Please assist in getting this legal mail provided to her today. 
Thank you-
Enjoy the long weekend. 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
New York, NY 10011 
Main: a 
Cell: 
Fax:

On Jan 15, 2021, at 11:01 AM, BOBBI C STERNHEIM <a> 
wrote: 
Good 
morning-
The "next-day" express mailing (referenced in yesterday's email 
below) 
was delivered to the MDC today at 7:25 am (see tracking information 
below). 
As requested, it is imperative that Ms. Maxwell be given this legal 
mail containing time-sensitive 
documents TODAY. 
Thank you-
EFTA00030881

Bobbi 
<image004.png> 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim 
New York, NY 10011 
Main: 
Cell: 
Fax: 
**Covid-19 Notice: The West 19th Street office is currently closed 
but we continue to work remotely. 
Please use email or fax, instead of regular mail, for all 
correspondence during this time. 
We continue to work regular business hours throughout this 
situation. 
Thank you for your consideration. Our best wishes for your good 
health and well being. 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the

that may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, 
distribute, or use this information. 
EFTA00030882

If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the 
sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this message. Thank 
you. 
On Jan 14, 2021, at 2:38 PM, BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
wrote: 
Good 
afternoon-
Yesterday, we expressed mailed time-sensitive documents to Ms. 
Maxwell for delivery today. 
We are requesting that this legal mail be given to Ms. Maxwell 
immediately. 
She must have them by tomorrow, Friday, for review over the 
weekend. 
I received no response to the email regarding these documents (see 
below). 
The courtesy of a response to today's email is appreciated. 
Thank you-
Bobbi 
On Jan 12, 2021, at 11:12 PM, BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
<a> wrote: 
Good 
morning-
On Thursday, 12/14, we are express mailing time-sensitive documents 
for next-day delivery for review by Ms. Maxwell. We need to discuss 
these documents with Ms. Maxwell on Tuesday 12/19, in order to comply 
with a court-ordered filing deadline. We understand that legal calls are 
suspended on holidays (Monday, 1/18, is Martin Luther King Day). 
EFTA00030883

To ensure that Ms. Maxwell receives the documents on Friday for 
review over the weekend, we are requesting permission to send them to 
the attention of the Legal Department for prompt delivery to Ms. 
Maxwell. 
Please let me know if this is acceptable. 
In addition, we are requesting that Ms. Maxwell be given access to 
the laptop 
computer provided by the government for use over the weekend. 
The MDC computers are not capable of opening discovery 
documents 
provided by the government, 
which is why the laptop has been provided. Without access to a 
computer that allows her 
to review discovery, Ms. Maxwell is effectively denied the ability 
to assist in her 
defense. 
Your assistance is greatly appreciated. 
Bobbi 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. 
Sternheim 
New York, NY 10011 
Main: 
Cell: 
Fax: 
EFTA00030884
